{{velocity}} #set ($configDocName = 'Mail.MailConfig') #set ($configDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($configDocName)) #set ($configClassName = 'Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass') #set ($configObj = $configDoc.getObject($configClassName)) ## ======================================================= ## Step 1: Migrate Mail config data ## ======================================================= ## We bundle Mail.MailConfig without a Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass xobject, allowing us to migrate mail configuration ## that were previously stored in XWikiPreferences into a Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass xobject. #if ($xcontext.action == 'admin' && "$!configObj" == '') ## Create the xobject #set ($configObj = $configDoc.newObject($configClassName)) ## Get the "obfuscate" value from the old location #set ($oldValue = $xwiki.getSpacePreference('obfuscateEmailAddresses')) #if ("$!oldValue" != '') #set ($discard = $configObj.set('obfuscate', $oldValue)) #end ## Save the new xobject! #set ($discard = $configDoc.save('Migrated Mail configuration found in XWikiPreferences', true)) #end ## ======================================================= ## Step 1: Display form ## ======================================================= #set ($params = { 'general': ['obfuscate'] }) #set ($paramDoc = $configDoc) #set ($paramClass = $configClassName) {{/velocity}}
